SELECT SEQ_PRODUCT_GROUP.Nextval as ID from DUAL
insert into PRODUCT_GROUP_BASIC(id,product_group_name,CREATE_SOURCE,START_TIME,create_time) values (SEQ_PRODUCT_GROUP.NEXTVAL,#{product_group_name},#{CREATE_SOURCE}, to_date (#{start_time},'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mi:ss' ),to_date (#{create_time},'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mi:ss' ))
mapper.update: update PRODUCT_GROUP_BASIC set SHARPE_RATIO = #{sharpRatio} where id = #{product_group_id}
update product_group_basic set status = 0,STOP_TIME =to_date(#{time},'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mi:ss') where id = #{product_group_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT id FROM product_group_basic
ID=#{productGroupCode}
AND CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#{startTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
AND CREATE_TIME <= to_date(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
and status = 1

select * from (select to_char(navlatestdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') navlatestdate from product_group_net_value where product_group_id = #{product_group_id} order by navlatestdate desc ) where rownum=1
select to_char(CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') CREATE_TIME from product_group_basic where id = #{product_group_id}

select sum(b.proportion*c.navadj) navadj,to_char(c.NAVLATESTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') NAVLATESTDATE from product_group_basic a,product_group_details b,
fund_net_value c
finance_net_value c
pm_net_value c
deposit_net_value c
where a.id=b.product_group_id and b.PRODUCT_CODE=c.code and to_char(c.NAVLATESTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{startTime} and b.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID=#{product_group_id} group by c.NAVLATESTDATE order by c.NAVLATESTDATE asc
